page.title: 10RELIGION (2)
page.content: Church attendance has dropped dramatically. With the influx caused by Nigg many other creeds are represented. Roman Catholic, Jehovah's Witnesses, Baptists now have churches in Easter Ross. At the same time perhaps about a quarter of the population have no church affiliation at all. Fifteen years ago every child in school would automatically bring a Bible to school for religious instruction. Today it is common for a child to say that there is not a Bible in their home Until 1947 there was a regular service in Gaelic in Hilton. Since then the use of Gaelic in church has disappeared as it has amongst the general populace. The Free Church minister is able to preach in Gaelic but none of the other denominations claim the use of Gaelic
